name: Neon Float
description:
Basic Instructions:

Reach the portal at the end of the level, avoid spiky things whilst staying inside the boundaries. Your character is able to stick and move around certain platforms.

Controls:

Move your character using A & D or the left joystick on a controller.

Modify gravity by using the arrow keys or the right joystick on a controller.

Jump using space bar or the A button on a controller

Game was created within 42 hours for Semester Game Jam 2020.

Credits:
